Name: Dream Catcher
Ingredients: 40 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. 
 Special ingredient #1: Dill syrup
Review: "The inspiration behind this cocktail goes beyond the drink and the person mixing it. Each ingredient represents a unique characteristic we all possess. It is the combination of these, at perfect equilibrium, that creates a harmonious symphony that touches everybody. Finding the balance between simplicity and complexity and being able to convey this within context, is a battle we all face. The content and concept is intended to arouse a sense of clarity, excitement and understanding that anything is attainable. In essence, a Dream Catcher."
History: South African Bacardí Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Assaf Yechiel at Orphanage in Cape Town, South Africa.
Nutrition: One serving of Dream Catcher contains 108 calories
